item.title: Learning more about Octopress
item.description: Just running through a test post again to go over the process and remind myself how this works!

item.title: Whoa! Octopress!
item.description: So, I just launched this new blog using Octopress. Here are the steps I followed: Basics How to Blog Deploying on Github I need to dig into the configuration stuff a little more. Writing This Post in Markdown I’m learning how to write this in Markdown which is also pretty new to me. Right now it feels like a lazy version of html, so we’ll see what’s it like as I get used to it.
